content: > presenting the first blanket in my > free yarn stash series - the v_stitch > blanket this blanket really is a classic that anyone can tackle all you need is a bunch of your favourite colour yarns - as many or as few as you like - and you re away using just a one row repeat this is the perfect beginner project to practice your technique and gauge the series will include blankets made with approximately 200g of double knit yarn using a 5mm/h hook the free download pattern has step by step tutorial photographs and written instructions with links to my blog for more hints and tips too so whether you want a therapeutic project to bust your yarn stash or are ready to start reading patterns and developing technique this is just the thing for you i am always available to help and love staying in contact with everyone - please share your work with me on facebook 1 or visit www hanjancrochet com 2 to find out what i m up to next enjoy hannah 1 http //www facebook com/hanjancrochet 2 http //www hanjancrochet com/blog/
